attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am writing on account of conflict diamond. Yes i agree that
    we have come up with a way of stopping the jewels from reaching
    the shops but it is mine and other people's opions that it is
    not the satisfaction of the customers that consume
    themselfs with useless jewels but it is of the children who are
    killed and kill everyday. imagine if you were stolen from your
    parents brought up in an atmosphere of war and aboilshment,
    then forced to kill your own parents... would you do it and
    spend a lifetime in a cave never to see the light. and there
    digging out more war.you are aware that the money made by the diamonds
     is used for more war and if they were to go to war the
    children would be put at the front line. in addition to this
    the goverment over there is doing nothing but you can. england
    is more powerful than africa ecspecially in places such as
    sirra leone. make a difference, save lives, save the generations to come.all you have to do is talk to the african goverment negotiate/send a group of armed forces to arrest them.PLEASE!
